title: What can I do if my Y536A1 phone fails to be charged?
answer:
l   If the battery power is completely used up:  
 Connect your phone to the charger and wait for 5 minutes. 

l   If the battery power is not completely used up:  
 Use the original charger provided with your phone. If the charging failure occurs when you use the original charger, replace the USB cable or power socket, or restart your phone.

l   If your phone is overheating:

Your phone adopts an over temperature protection design that disables charging if your phone is overheating. 

Do not play games, watch videos, or use other power-intensive applications while charging. 

> 

> 

> > >
> > >  If the problem persists, contact Huawei technical support or take your phone to an authorized Huawei service center.
> > >
